I love her though.
I hope to one day be happy with myself.

participant_2.background:

I like every post i see on social media.

When people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.

content.text: I'm a big fan of dressing up to go out clubbing. I love the way it makes me feel and I always have a great time.
Me too! I love showing off my latest outfit and getting compliments from people.
I don't think my girlfriend really understands my love of clubbing. She doesn't like to go out as much as I do and I think she thinks it's a waste of money.
That's too bad. I'm lucky that my husband loves to go out just as much as I do. We have a lot of fun together.

I'm glad you have someone who shares your love of clubbing. I'm trying to save up to get some plastic surgery done. I'm not happy with the way I look and I think it would make me feel better about myself.
I'm sorry to hear that you're not happy with the way you look. I hope you can find a way to feel better about yourself.
I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a really nice person and I'm sure you're beautiful just the way you are.
Thank you. That means a lot.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook new recipes. I'm always trying new things and I love sharing my creations with my friends and family.
That sounds really fun. I'm not a very good cook, but I love to eat.
You should try cooking more. It's really easy and it's a great way to impress your friends and family.
I'll have to give it a try.
You should! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
